item.title: Performance Testing Interview Questions, Part 3: LoadRunner
item.description: Originally posted here. Like it or not, LoadRunner is one of the most popular commercial load test tools, and with good reason. Its protocol support is extensive, and many a load tester has cut his/her teeth on LoadRunner. In this last part of our interview series, weâ€™ll go over some questions you may have to answer when interviewing for a role using Mercury HP MicroFocus LoadRunner. What sort of transactions would you put into vuser_init and vuser_end?
